price: Şübhəsiz ki, Allah yanında (yer üzündə) gəzən canlıların ən pisi (haqqı) anlamayan karlar və lallardır.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi al-ṣumu al-buk'mu alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
